body.name: Office Chair, Ergonomic Desk Chair with Adjustable Lumbar Support, High Back Mesh Computer Chair with Flip-up Armrests-BIFMA Passed Task Chairs, Executive Chair for Home Office
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 8 hrs 30 mins
features: 【ERGONOMIC DESIGN OFFICE CHAIR--Improve Your Posture】The design of the backrest fits the shape of the human spine, with the adjustable lumbar support, the office chair will give your back strong support. And the thick seat also can relieve the hip pressure to offer you comfort. Thick padded back & seat take this chair to the next level of comfort. Choose this office chair, choose comfort.

【ADJUSTABLE DESK CHAIR--More Comfort】This task chair has a 4 inch lifting range to meet the needs of people of different heights, it also has a reclining function of 90-135 °which allows you to relax yourselves after work. This mesh computer chair with flip-up armrest and seat height adjustable means you can find the perfect position to ensure you a pain-free day for long hour sitting.

【HIGH QUALITY MATERIAL--Work is Easier】Certified by BIFMA and SGS. Mimoglad Office Chairs have Soft High-density form Seat, which is covered with durable breathable mesh fabric and has good elasticity and difficult to deform to keep comfort for longer hours. Height-adjustable GAS LIFT CHROMED, Heavy-duty base and nylon smooth-rolling casters for great stability and mobility to help promote a comfortable seated position, keeping you comfy after long hours of game or work at home.

【SPACE SAVING】The simple style of the mesh office chair adapts ideally to any office furniture, especially in living rooms, bedroom, kitchen, study and office, and can be used in a variety of ways, you can flip the arms up and put it under the desk for saving space.

【WORRY FREE & Perfect Gift Idea】360 degree swivel, made of heavy-duty noiseless casters, its explosion-proof base plate with a 5-star base increases safety and stability. Maximum capacity up to 300LB desk chair. We Guarantee our customers 100% satisfaction with our premium desk chair! If you’re not satisfied with this executive chair, just email us and get a replacement or a full refund WITH NO EXCUSE!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars An incredible chair, at an amazing price.
reviews.reviewText: For the price, this is one of the best chairs you can get. It is extremely comfortable, the back support is great. It is firm, but not uncomfortably so. Just enough to not feel the frame in your seat. The moving armrests are also great, it makes getting out of the chair super easy. And finally, assembly is so simple. I was intimidated as I started pulling parts out, but once I started, it took about 15 minutes, and all the parts and tools are included.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Sturdy and comfortable
reviews.reviewText: I like how high the back is on the chair, definitely gives you a lot of support. Rolls around very easily and is very sturdy. Simple design and is not hard to put together. I appreciated the T-handle Allen wrench, which made for a very easy assembly. The seat itself feels very comfortable and doesn't seem to be made from that cheap memory foam that usually flattens over time. Overall, very pleased so far!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy to assemble nice chair, Sturdy and comfortable.
reviews.reviewText: Needed a new desk chair with better support for my back the lumbar support is a bonus feature. Rolls around very easily and is very sturdy. Simple design and is not hard to put together. The T-handle Allen wrench made for a very easy assembly. I am very pleased with my purchase of this product. 1 of the ladies in my office wants me to give it to her and get me another.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great office chair for a good price
reviews.reviewText: I recently ordered this Mimoglad office chair from Amazon. I received in just a few days. It was easy to assemble following the instructions and using the provided t-handle Allen wrench. It’s comfortable and fits nicely in my home office. It seems to be a solid chair. The adjustable arms allow it to tuck in to the desk to save space.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love the chair so far. Pretty easy to put together. Shipped quickly. Comfortable. Love the arms that raise up. Nice wide seat. Rolls smoothly. Reasonable price point.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent value and still like new after 2 years
reviews.reviewText: Love this chair! I have been using mine for 2 years and just ordered another for my husband. Quiet, easy to adjust, and breathable. Very sturdy. Comes wrapped like fine china, everything individually cushioned and even white gloves for the installer! Easy instructions but works faster with 2 people.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy, easy to assemble, comfortable
reviews.reviewText: I love my new office chair. It is comfortable. I can spend many hours at one sitting without feeling tired. The lumbar provides good support for my back. The great thing about this chair is it only took less than 1/2 hour to assemble it. The instructions were very clear. All the parts were there and fit snuggly. I enjoy being able to raise the arm rest up so I can slide the chair into the desk and save foot print. This chair was built to last.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing chair at an affordable price
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this chair for the sale price and received it within a couple of business days. It was very easy to put together and came with a pair of installation gloves. I love how comfortable it is and that I can move the arm rests up and down. There were a large variety of colors to pick from so I was able to find something that worked for me. I would definitely recommend.
Second one bought. Easy to put together. Durable. Comfortable. Looks great

Tuve miedo de comprar la silla por qué hubo comentarios malos, sin embargo me atreví y puedo decir que desde el momento que la destape supe que era una silla que valía la pena, es súper cómoda y elegante de material muy resistente.Lo uso para trabajo diario y es de las sillas que he adquirido desde que estamos en homme Office la definitiva y la consentida.

reviews.reviewTitle: Silla de muy buena calidad y comodidad
reviews.reviewText: La uso 8 horas al día y es muy cómoda. Descansabrazos muy cómodos. Estoy muy contento con esta compra y es muy probable que compre otra silla igual.

[Actualización 1 año después de usarla, Nov 14 2022]Después de un año de usarla puedo decir que fue una muy buena invesión, la silla se sigue sintiendo cómoda del asiento, del ajuste de la espalda se fue aflojando con el tiempo pero nada que una almohada de ellos mismos no arregle para tener una buena postura.Fuera de eso la silla sigue funcionando bien, no ha fallado la nivelación de altura como en otras marcas, se sigue moviendo bien en las ruedas y el asiento sigue esponjoso y cómodo.[Fin de actualización ^]Compré esta silla para reemplazar otra que ya me estaba molestando, ya que paso grandes jornadas trabajando en la computadora. Por lo tanto, busqué sillas que más que nada tuvieran un buen soporte para la espalda y un buen acolchado en el asiento, también que el material tenga una buena calidad.Me sorprendió este producto, ya que si cumplió con mis expectativas de su imagen y su descripción, el asiento es muy cómodo, tiene un muy buen relleno, no es para nada como otros asientos que tienen solo el material de tela.MaterialesLos materiales usados se ven de excelente calidad, la base de las ruedas es de un tipo de metal, no es de plástico, por lo que no habrá inconvenientes de que se doble fácilmente o se expanda el hoyo en donde se inserta la rueda.Soporte de espaldaEl soporte de la espalda es ajustable para la altura, por lo que podrás subirlo o bajarlo a tu gusto. Si eres una persona muy alta, recomendaría ir por la silla que tiene soporte para la cabeza.InstalaciónEl producto viene en una caja dentro de una caja más grande de Amazon, como es de costumbre. Dentro de la caja del producto te viene el instructivo, las piezas envueltas en sus plásticos protectores y las herramientas correctamente etiquetados para su fácil uso. También, incluye un par de guantes blancos para realizar el armado de la silla, lo cual nos ayuda a evitar dejar manchas de nuestras manos y da una experiencia bastante placentera. Es muy fácil de armar, ya que el instructivo está muy bien explicado.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great chair for the price with one downside.
reviews.reviewText: Pros:- Good lumbar support- Comfortable seating- Easy to assemble the first time- The arm rests are good, they don’t squeak like my last one- Easy to change the height and the locking mechanism works greatCons:- The wheels are very noisy when moving the chair around on wooden floor, but if it’s on top of a rug or carpet then it’s fine. If this is a deal breaker for you don’t get this chair.Overall I’m satisfied with the chair, hopefully it survives the test of time. Would recommend. If it wasn’t for the noisy wheels I would give it 5 stars.
